text: Mariyu atanini israyil santati vari vaipuku sandesaharuniga pamputadu. (Atanu ila antadu): "Niscayanga, nenu mi prabhuvu taraphu nundi mi vaddaku sucana (ayat) tisukoni vaccanu. Niscayanga, nenu mi koraku mattito paksi akaranlo oka bom'manu tayarucesi danilo svasanu udutanu! Appudadi allah ajnato paksi avutundi. Mariyu nenu allah ajnato puttugruddini, kusthurogini bagu cestanu mariyu mrtunni bratikistanu. Mariyu miru tinedi, indlalo kudabettedi miku teluputanu. Miru visvasule ayite! Niscayanga, indulo miku oka goppa sucana (ayat) undi
